explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in the development of their hybrid model for multivariate volatility.
explanations.deep learning: The use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) falls under the umbrella of deep learning techniques, as RNNs are a type of deep learning model.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper specifically develops a model that uses recurrent neural networks (RNNs) to capture conditional variances in a GO-GARCH framework.
